code:
%%{HealthTech_PatientRecords}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
    [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> Idle
    
    Idle --> Monitoring: CRON tick / YieldSnapshot event
    
    Monitoring --> Comparing: Collect APY data
    
    Comparing --> NoAction: APY diff < 0.5%
    Comparing --> SmallRebalance: APY diff >= 0.5% && change < 50%
    Comparing --> LargeRebalance: APY diff >= 0.5% && change >= 50%
    
    NoAction --> Idle: emit RebalanceSkipped
    
    SmallRebalance --> Executing: emit Callback(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
    
    LargeRebalance --> PendingFinality: Queue rebalance
    PendingFinality --> PendingFinality: Wait 64 blocks
    PendingFinality --> Executing: Finality reached
    
    Executing --> Completed: Rebalance executed
    Completed --> Idle: Reset
    
    note right of Monitoring
        Every ~12 minutes
        or on manual trigger
    end note
    
    note right of PendingFinality
        Safety measure for
        large TVL changes
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 的环节。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine'，对吧？
